entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
